item_category: iPhone 12 mini packs big features in a 5.4-inch design. Incredible low-light photography with Night mode on all cameras. Cinema-grade Dolby Vision HDR video recording, editing and playback. Powerful A14 Bionic chip. 5G capable and new MagSafe accessories for easy attach and faster wireless charging. It's big news for mini.
review_title: Very happy with my new phone
Phone is super quick and snappy
just the size of phone I wanted
Very neat and easy to handle
A much needed improvement - a smaller screen!
Perfect size for a perfect phone
I love the new iPhone mini very fast
IPhone 12 Mini is elegant & so fast
Perfect size and extremely responsive phone.

review_text: Very nice compact phone and has all features which we have been looking for
Like everything about my new phone
Gift for my daughter, she said the iPhone 12 mini is brilliant!
After my previous three iPhones this on is superb.
Very pleased with my purchase and a great price
I decided to treat myself to this phone, great size, works fantastic, very quick, I can run so much at one time, great colour, easy to set up! Very happy with this.
Very good ……………………..
Fantastic little iPhone very powerful battery lasts all day sound is loud just what you need for a cheeky movie at work
Really pleased with this phone, the one I had before was iPhone 6s Plus but like this better because it is smaller. I love Apple

Screen is really sharp with vibrant colours although not cartoonish. Like the new design,easier to grinp when using a case.Feels speedier when scrolling through web pages or social media. Amazing sound quality!

Delighted with my iphone 12 mini. I didn't wnat a larger heavy phone. This was just slightly bigger than my old phone and light enough for me to hold. Transferring my details from my old iphone was so simple. i'm glad I chose iphone again
Working good, im recomend them
Super amazing phone it’s the perfect size! hard to drop compared to bigger iphones, runs super fast! the 5G is going to be great when it comes to my area!
Exactly what I wanted. Perfect size and love the colour.
Fine Phone, Works Perfectly easy to transfer from old device.
Just like a miniature iPad with an excellent camera

Good price, cheaper than buying from Apple.
Looks nice in blue

Upgraded from the iPhone 11 Pro Max, which I absolutely hated, to the iPhone 12 Mini and I am in love.

The size is just perfect, the green colour is absolutely gorgeous and the phone is so much snappier and well refined than the 11 series. 

I really hope Apple continue to make a mini-series iPhone, there is still a market out here for people who don’t like the bigger screens!
Good quality and good price
Nice service. Ready for collect really quick
done it again well done apple

I had been thinking about replacing my old iPhone 5s but wasn’t keen on getting a big device. As soon as the iPhone 12 Mini was announced I knew that it would be the best option.
It’s light and super fast. The size is perfect (I can use it with just one hand even with a cover) and the screen is very sharp and detailed. The photos and videos are very natural and detailed and the battery has been lasting 2/3 days with moderate use.
Very happy with it and definitely recommend it.

Very happy with the new iPhone mini, goes very fast.
Love it 
Take beautiful photos
Great phone for the price, fabulous photos taken on it ..impressed
It's a mini phone with a large screen, it's so beautiful. I so happy with my product.
I bought this for a friend and they are, "very pleased with it". They said: "It is the perfect size and extremely responsive."
Fantastic customer service, replaced my awful Samsung phone with no bother and couldn’t be more helpful (unlike Samsung). Very pleased with my new iPhone. Thank you Argos Hinckley
Great phone happy I chose to purchase from argos fat delivery
Price îs good and High quality
Excellent phone well worth the money

Have had a number of iPhones in the past, but this one really excited me.  As one would expect from Apple, excellent in all characteristics.  Particularly impressed by battery life.  With previous iPhones, had to recharge daily.  However, this one lasts nearly 3 days between charges.  Gorgeous piece of kit!!
After thinking it over and over I’m glad I took the plunge and went for the iPhone mini. Love the pastel mint colour and have had no problems with the phone itself
Very good...........
Works as described, no problems
The iPhone 12 mini is great if you don't want a huge and cumbersome phone. Small and light it takes great pictures and has all the quality you expect from Apple.
This phone is perfect it’s comfortable to hold and charged quick
Do buy from Argos please

Amazing phone!!!
As title been hanging onto smaller SE (old iPhone 5S body) for years until smaller versions. Snapped the mini up straight a way. Spot on. Camera good. Sounds good. Reach screen with one hand. Fits in pocket. 
Perfect for the average male. 
It’s got that contemporary look the 5 had too. Probs Love You xxx the best looking iPhone that’s ever been made. 
Love it.

Only bad point is it’s iPhone mini 12 battery is smaller so battery don’t last as long 
I Would recommend iPhone 12 Pro

For those who are not addicted to their phone, who prefer a smaller footprint, and demand all the features of the larger phones (not the reduced feature stuff like the SE models had) this is what you were waiting for.
